text:
="preserve">André-Paul Duchâteau (8 May 1925 – 26 August 2020) was a Belgian comics writer and mystery novelist. He was born in Tournai, Belgium. He worked with Tibet on the detective comics series "Ric Hochet" and the more humoristic western comic "Chick Bill". He also wrote under the pseudonym Michel Vasseur.
Duchâteau died on 26 August 2020 in Uccle, Belgium at the age of 95.
